title: Webhook delivery failures affecting multiple merchants
description: Multiple merchants reported webhooks not being delivered. Root cause was our webhook service rate limiting on the sender side.
root_cause: Webhook queue backlog caused by database connection pool exhaustion
resolution: Increased database connection pool from 20 to 50 connections. Implemented circuit breaker pattern for webhook delivery.
resolution_steps: Applied hotfix to increase pool size
lessons_learned: Need better alerting on database connection pool utilization

title: Stripe integration breaking after API upgrade
description: Merchants unable to process payments after we upgraded the Stripe API version. Error: Invalid API key.
root_cause: API version upgrade changed the key format validation. Existing keys needed re-authentication.
resolution: Rolled back API version temporarily. Created migration script to re-validate existing payment credentials.
resolution_steps: Immediate rollback to previous API version
lessons_learned: Payment integrations need separate staging validation before production rollout

title: Currency display showing USD instead of store currency
description: European merchants seeing USD prices instead of EUR. Caused by a caching issue after locale settings update.
root_cause: CDN cache not invalidated after currency settings change. Cached storefront pages showing old currency.
resolution: Implemented automatic cache invalidation when currency settings change. Purged CDN cache for affected stores.
resolution_steps: Identified CDN as the caching layer
Added currency settings to cache key
lessons_learned: Currency/locale settings should trigger automatic cache invalidation

title: Rate limiting incorrectly applied to bulk endpoints
description: Merchants hitting rate limits on bulk product endpoints even when under quota. Bug in rate limiter configuration.
root_cause: Rate limiter was counting bulk items instead of requests. A 500-item bulk request counted as 500 toward limit.
resolution: Fixed rate limiter to count requests not items. Bulk endpoints now have separate higher limits.
lessons_learned: Bulk endpoints need different rate limiting strategy

title: OAuth token expiry mismatch
description: Merchants reporting tokens expiring after 1 hour instead of documented 24 hours.
root_cause: Documentation was outdated. Token expiry was changed to 1 hour in security update but docs weren't updated.
resolution: Updated documentation to reflect 1-hour expiry. Added guidance on proper refresh token usage.
resolution_steps: Added refresh token best practices guide
lessons_learned: Security changes must include documentation updates in same release

title: VAT double-charging for EU customers
description: EU customers being charged VAT twice - once in price and again at checkout.
root_cause: Merchants had 'Prices include tax' enabled but also 'Calculate tax at checkout'. Only one should be active.
resolution: Provided clear guidance on tax configuration. Added validation to prevent conflicting settings.
resolution_steps: Added UI validation for conflicting options
lessons_learned: Tax settings need better UI to prevent common misconfigurations

title: Product images not appearing after bulk upload
description: Merchant uploaded 500 images via API but they weren't appearing on product pages.
root_cause: Merchant was uploading to media endpoint but not linking to products. Two-step process required.
resolution: Explained media-to-product linking process. Updated documentation with clear examples.
lessons_learned: Media upload documentation needs clearer step-by-step guide

title: Password login failing for migrated customers
description: Customers migrated from old platform unable to log in. Password hash incompatibility.
root_cause: Old platform used bcrypt with cost factor 10, new platform expected cost factor 12.
resolution: Added backward compatibility for old hash format. Auto-upgrade hash on successful login.
lessons_learned: Migration scripts must handle password hash compatibility

title: Discount code minimum purchase not clearly documented
description: Merchants creating discount codes unaware of minimum purchase requirements. Customers confused.
root_cause: Discount creation UI didn't clearly show minimum purchase was set. Documentation lacked examples.
resolution: Improved discount UI to show active restrictions. Added troubleshooting guide for discount issues.
lessons_learned: All restrictions should be visible in summary view before saving

title: Search index not updating after product imports
description: Products added via CSV import not appearing in search. Manual indexing required.
root_cause: Bulk import jobs weren't triggering search index update events. Only individual product creates did.
resolution: Added search index trigger to bulk import completion. Implemented incremental indexing.
lessons_learned: All product mutation paths must trigger search indexing
